body_html:
Yes, it would be better to have the assert in the C++ side.
But I am not sure if then the traceback gets lost.
Is the C++ exception traceback readable? I have sometimes error msgs that are unrelated to the error.
If yes, only C++ else C++ and python.

I am not familiar with the C++ code (and style), so maybe someone other can make the changes?

body:
Yes, it would be better to have the assert in the C++ side.
But I am not sure if then the traceback gets lost.
Is the C++ exception traceback readable? I have sometimes error msgs that are unrelated to the error.
If yes, only C++ else C++ and python.

I am not familiar with the C++ code (and style), so maybe someone other can make the changes?
